SUB_W04_WRLD_COMM_MAXLP_CHANGE_000_CUT_0.speaker: UI
SUB_W04_WRLD_COMM_MAXLP_CHANGE_000_CUT_0.text: Your maximum LP was decreased by 1.

SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_STRONG_R.speaker: UI
SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_SHIPYARD_STRONG_R.text:
You've acquired the ultimate raft!
You can now tackle large cyclones
without swapping to another ship.

SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.speaker: UI
SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_BASE_NORTHHARBOR_WORLD.text:
A large cyclone has appeared. You will need
a sturdier ship—such as a sailboat—if you want
to join in the battle taking place at the base of the storm.

SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_PARTY_LEAVE_000_CUT_00.speaker: UI
SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_PARTY_LEAVE_000_CUT_00.text:
A member of your group has left.
Check your retinue and formation.

SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Guess I be a guardian now...
But what in all the hells do I do?

SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Well, I won't find me answer just
sittin' here havin' a think.

SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W04_EVAR_COMM_GHOSTSHIP_LASTBATTLE_0.text:
Hoist the sails, lads!
We're pushin' off!
